Title: The Soviet Union is our example
Designer: Zhao Yannian (赵延年)Qian Daxin (钱大昕)
Publisher: Donghua renmin meishu chubanshe (东华人民美术出版社) Shanghai
Notes: The building in the background represents the Soviet Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Moscow, completed in 1953.This is a print from the second edition (October 1953).
